programme.title: Prodigal
programme.desc: A conflicted individual stuck in a dangerous city with their disabled sibling has to make a choice that could alter their lives forever.

programme.title: Kevin Hart: Standing Tall
programme.desc: Laughter is the best medicine. Just ask Kevin Hart. Comedy would rule as an antidote to a troubled childhood. Hartâ€™s work ethic has no limits, with 8 comedy specials, 54 films, 90 TV shows, and a world tour to date.

programme.title: Pushout: The Criminalization of Black Girls in Schools
programme.desc: Following a relative's mysterious death, a couple faces strange events and eerie neighbors in their inherited home.

programme.title: Shabu
programme.desc: Shabu, a 14-year-old artist from "The Paperclip," Rotterdam's tough hood, wrecks his grandma's car and must hustle to repay her by summer's end, using his music and wit to shine.

programme.title: Murder City Angels
programme.desc: In a desperate seach for a fresh start, Nick races against time to clear his name and embrace a family-focused life.

programme.title: Malicious Intent
programme.desc: Six years post-justice, secrets unravel, and a son emerges, stirring a pot of trust and betrayal.

programme.title: Jackson Bolt
programme.desc: Detective Jackson Bolt seeks revenge after his partner's murder. Framed by his former kickboxing promoter, he fights to clear his name, save his wife, and confront a dangerous foe.

programme.title: Self-Compassion Meditations
programme.desc: Discover a transformative meditation series that nurtures self-compassion, freeing your mind and body with loving acceptance and boundless kindness. Unleash your potential!

programme.title: Target: Philadelphia
programme.desc: The 1985 MOVE bombing exposes the intertwined histories of police militarization and Black militancy in the United States.

programme.title: Phoenix
programme.desc: Phoenix must confront his childhood traumas in a tight-knit religious community, and expose the sinister secrets that have haunted him.

programme.title: Sisters of the Wilderness
programme.desc: Five Zulu women embark on a backpacking adventure in South Africa's wilderness. As they face threats to nature, their journey becomes a powerful tale of self-discovery and healing.

programme.title: Same Girl
programme.desc: Siblings' bond strains amid romantic rivalry's growing intensity.

programme.title: Brown Girl Begins
programme.desc: It's 2049 on a forsaken island off the coast of Toronto, where the survival of the islanders depends on young Ti-Jeanne to risk death by a spirit so she can take her place as a Caribbean priestess and save her people.

programme.title: Forever Yours
programme.desc: Adrienne (Patricia Rhinvil) is a dance choreographer whose destiny is upturned when she takes a job at a community center in Brooklyn NY, and meets JC (Macc Plaise), a soccer coach.

programme.title: Christmas with the Carters
programme.desc: Carter family unites in chaos to reclaim stolen Christmas.

programme.title: Sleigh Queen
programme.desc: Sole, a resilient stylist, dreams of a career boost amid holiday chaos, yearning to reign supreme.
